verses.name: Proverbs 24:1
verses.text: Be not thou envious against evil men, neither desire to be with them.

verses.name: Proverbs 24:2
verses.text: For their heart studieth destruction, and their lips talk of mischief.

verses.name: Proverbs 24:3
verses.text: Through wisdom is an house builded; and by understanding it is established:

verses.name: Proverbs 24:4
verses.text: And by knowledge shall the chambers be filled with all precious and pleasant riches.

verses.name: Proverbs 24:5
verses.text: A wise man is strong; yea, a man of knowledge increaseth strength.

verses.name: Proverbs 24:6
verses.text: For by wise counsel thou shalt make thy war: and in multitude of counsellors there is safety.

verses.name: Proverbs 24:7
verses.text: Wisdom is too high for a fool: he openeth not his mouth in the gate.
